paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the KCNH2 gene variant N588K associated with Short QT Syndrome Type 1, detailing its clinical significance, penetrance data, and functional effects.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient with familial SQTS1 carries the N588K mutation in hERG channel.

functional_data.summary: The N588K mutation leads to enhanced hERG channel current, affecting drug sensitivity and channel gating kinetics.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The study emphasizes the differential effects of drugs on hERG channels with this mutation.
key_quotes: The patient with familial SQTS1 carries the N588K mutation in hERG channel.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned in the text.
